episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4001_1001: Thanks for the tip, kiddo!
Say, why aren’t you scared of me?

Little scamps like you usually run away the
moment they see my face...
You don’t look scary to me!

And my mommy says that if someone says thank
you, that means they’re a good person!
I see! Your mom sure knows what’s what, kiddo!

Hm? And who are you? That’s quite a fierce
expression for such a wee little scamp!

You’re not runnin’ away scared, either... There
sure are some oddballs here on Pasio!

The name’s Archie. I run an organization called
Team Aqua.

Basically, we’re a group of environmentalists
focused on protectin’ the ocean!

Lemme ask you something—what do you think
of Pasio?
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4001_0401: Tch... You don’t get it, do you.
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4001_1001:
Lemme tell you somethin’, kiddo. The ocean is an
irreplaceable treasure for every livin’ thing on
this planet.
But just look at this travesty!

Humans caused massive damage to the ocean
to make this artificial island, all to satisfy their
selfish egos!

We of Team Aqua work for the sake of all
Pokémon of the sea!

Our mission is to return nature and the ocean back
to their unspoiled origins!
Pasio is no exception!

This island makes me sick. I’d smash it to pieces
if I could.
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4001_0401:
If the ocean had feelings, I’m sure it’d feel the
same way about this island bein’ plopped on top
of it.
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4001_0402:
But what did the ocean ever do to anyone? Why’s
it gotta put up with havin’ this island plopped on
top of it?
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4001_1001:
Well, it’s all moot anyway. I just got a tip that
Kyogre was spotted on this island.

With its power, I can carry out my plan to sink
Pasio into the ocean!
This is my chance to make Kyogre’s power mine...
You better not get in my way!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4002_1001:
Very interesting. So this Lear individual is the
creator of Pasio.
Intriguing. I’d like to meet him.

I guess that’s fine, but you better promise me you
won’t do anything bad on Pasio!

We have enough to deal with since Groudon
showed up.
Hm? Groudon is here, you say?

Wait, were you planning to capture him
all along?!

*chuckle* I understand now... You think I’m some
ruthless villain.

I’m the leader of Team Magma, an organization
dedicated to finding paths upon which humanity
may stride freely forward and evolve.

We need Groudon’s power to achieve our
ideal world!
Of course, I don’t intend to take anything by force.
Oh, it’s [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Wait, what?!

Archie’s gonna use Kyogre to sink Pasio into
the ocean?!

That fool... He’s always coming up with these
outrageous ideas.
OK! I’ll see you soon!

I couldn’t help but overhear your conversation.
Archie’s here on Pasio, isn’t he.

If so, we’ll need to formulate a solid strategy to
stop him.
Wait, you’re gonna help us?
Well, we can’t let him sink the island, can we?
Fine... You can help us out.
But don’t you dare do anything shady, got it?!
Of course. You have my word.
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4003_1001: All right, Maxie. You have a plan to stop Archie?

Specifically, we have to prevent Archie from
making contact with Kyogre.

But just in case, I’ll approach Groudon in the
meantime and get it to join our side.

If we do end up battling Kyogre, it’s true that
Groudon would be our best chance at beating it...
but I’m still a little worried.
Brendan, do you think we can do it?

I understand your concern, May. But if we don’t
stop him, it’s going to be a disaster.
I can’t just give up and watch that happen!

You’re right, Brendan... OK! You can count on
me, too!

So we’re all on the same page? Then it’s time to
execute our plan.

Hold on a second! If Maxie’s going to Groudon,
what should the rest of us do?

Brendan—that’s your name, isn’t it? Why don’t
you come with me.

You’re the one who knows where Groudon
is, right?

In that case, [Name:PlayerNickname ] and I
should try to find Archie...
and stop him from capturing Kyogre!

Both parts of our plan are gonna be tough, but
we have to do our best to protect Pasio!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4004_1001:
How can they call this island nature? It’s nothin’
but a blob of human greed!

Whaddya think, Kyogre?! Wanna help me plunge
Pasio into the briny deep?!

Together, you and I are gonna make this sullied
ocean pristine again!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4004_0402: Who said that?! Oh, it’s you again.
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4004_1001: Doesn’t look like you came here to help me out.
You can’t just sink Pasio into the ocean!

Of course I can, kiddo! What, it’s OK to pollute
the ocean, but sinking an island is where the
line’s drawn?

Why don’t you explain that? It’s the same thing,
isn’t it?!

but people and Pokémon live on it just like any
other natural island!
This island is full of life!
Full of life, huh? You might have a point there.

But what about all the living creatures that lost
their homes because of this island?
Building Pasio damaged the nature surrounding it!
How can you say that’s OK?
It’s not OK! I never said it was!
Oh no... Kyogre’s going to attack!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4005_1001:
Maxie, do you know how you’re gonna get
Groudon to come with us?
I suppose the only way is to defeat it in battle.
Wait, we have to battle Groudon?

Sometimes, a bit of force is necessary in order to
get things done.

But I understand why you’re so surprised. It will
be dangerous after all.

Do you want to turn back now? I won’t hold it
against you if you do.

Hmph. If only we had a little more time, I could
have come up with a more efficient solution, but
we just have to work with what we have.
I don’t mind! And I’ll do what I can to save Pasio!
Even if it means I have to battle Groudon!

I may not look it, but I’m pretty strong! Leave the
battling to me!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4006_1001: This is where I spotted Groudon.
Treecko! Cover Mightyena and corner Groudon!

I’ll have you join me, Groudon! To protect the
land...and fulfill my ambitions!
Sounds like we may be too late.
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4007_1001:
At this rate, even [Name:PlayerNickname ] is
gonna get pushed back...

That’s it, Kyogre! Sink this island to the bottom of
the ocean!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4007_0401: Yeah, I’m fine! But we need to stop them!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4007_0402: Thanks! But we have to stop those two!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4007_1001:
Get outta here! The ocean will rise and swallow
everything up!
Oh no! That little girl is in danger!
What on earth are you doing?

There’s no consistency to your actions. How do you
expect your subordinates to ever respect you as
their leader?

Hmph. We can save the chitchat for later. Right
now, our first priority is stopping those two.

Hey, you little scamps! Take care of this kid! Get
her to safer ground!

Let’s go, Sharpedo! We’re gonna stop Kyogre
and Groudon!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4008_1001: C’mon, Maxie! Don’t you dare hold me back!
I could say the same to you.

They’re strong... I suppose they aren’t called
super-ancient Legendary Pokémon just for show.
We got that little girl to a safe place! She’s OK!

Good. Thanks for doing that. Now I can finally
cut loose!

It pains me to even suggest this, but allow me to
distract them. Use that opportunity to stop at least
one of them.
I’m sure you can handle that, Archie.

What’re you actin’ all high and mighty for! Just
shut up and watch me!
There, they stopped moving... Do it!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4008_0401: We got this! Don’t fall behind, May!
Don’t worry! We’re going all-out to save Pasio!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4008_0402:
Yeah! Here comes our full-force attack! These
super-ancient Pokémon won’t know what hit ’em!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4009_1001: Whew! They finally stopped...

I wonder why they were so upset in the
first place.
This is just my own hypothesis...

but perhaps these super-ancient Pokémon were
somehow influenced by us.
Wait, are you sayin’ it’s my fault?

Not just yours. I’d say the fault lies equally with
us both.

After all, we came here from another region,
didn’t we?

And Groudon and Kyogre are also from
that region.

They never existed on Pasio to begin with. Isn’t
that right?

Yeah, because there aren’t any wild Pokémon on
Pasio in the first place.
What’s your point?

Are you sayin’ Groudon and Kyogre came here
because of us?
That doesn’t explain why they were rampaging!
Um... I think maybe they just felt overwhelmed.

If I were them, I’d be really scared to suddenly
find myself in a strange, new place, too.

Hah! That’s pretty pathetic for a couple of
super-ancient Legendary Pokémon!
Well, this is all conjecture, of course.
But if they were raging because of us...

then we’ve gotta take responsibility for that,
don’t we?!
I’m sorry, Kyogre!

I get it! You were freakin’ out over bein’ in some
new place you didn’t recognize!

But that battle we just had showed you that we
make a good team, right?

Why don’t I take care of you until we can head
back home?
Wait, that means...
Yeah, I’ll stop trying to sink Pasio into the ocean.

Well...I can’t say this was part of the plan, but if
you find me worthy of being your partner, I won’t
stop you from joining me.
So...I guess that’s the end of that, then?
Yup! Looks like it!
I really hope so...

You two better not do anything else extreme just
to fulfill your ambitions, got it?!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4009_0301: I’m so glad Pasio is safe!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4009_0401:
Me too! We should head back and let everyone
know it’s safe!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4009_0402:
Sounds like a plan! The sooner we let everyone
know they’re safe, the better!
episode_event_matsubusa_aogiri/4010_1001: Oh, NOW you two show up?!

Hmph. I can’t believe you came after the situation
was already resolved.

Now that the administrators of our respective 
organizations are here on Pasio, I suppose
that means...

We can’t keep playin’ nice together on Pasio
anymore, huh?

Eh, that’s more our style anyway! Don’t you think
so, too, Maxie-boy?
Hmph. I hate to admit it, but I do agree.

Even if it was just temporary, I suppose it wasn’t
so bad teaming up with you.

Whoa, hold your Horsea. No battlin’ without me
orderin’ it, all right?

We can save it for next time! Now that your
crew’s all here, we can battle as much as
we want!

Agreed. Let’s call a short truce...for now,
at least.
